"Hello, pleased to make your aquaintence.  I'm Lord Perseus.  We are
attemp=
ting to fix a small power problem, I'll radio back to you in a
few minutes.=
  Perseus out."

They continued to the power room, where Salveo was already=
 trying to
figure out what was wrong with the reactor.  Perseus held up a s=
mall
light so they could see what they were working with.  Hopefully this
w=
ould be a relatively painless repair.

On 7/26/05, Tankor <lordofdarkness11=
001@...> wrote:
> " This is BlackArachnia and Silverbolt"
>

peately hit it until it a part of it fell off

 was a sound of a door opening and hurried
> > footsteps.  Perseus followed=
 and discovered that they had found a way

ll dark.

coming in.

that light

on the

s." he said to himself as he

ongest, "Hello, is somebody

 darkness.  Small lights flicker in the distance, some tired

ng and shuffling of feet.  Lord Perseus stands to his feet, and

nks of something to say.

lright?"

y a word.

ounded by at least 3 pairs of lights.

e here and I have no idea what is
> going

ink we all just woke up not 20 minutes ago.  We were trying to

 a way out of this room, or cave.   We're not certain where we

  Perhaps you can help us."

rudent thing to do; first let me know

r a converstation.  Ok, lets

 kind of room this is.  OK?"
